titles.title: Providing for the designation of certain minority employees.
Providing for the designation of certain minority employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This resolution names individuals to fill six specified minority party employee positions authorized by the Legislative Pay Act of 1929. The minority leader is authorized to appoint and set the annual rate of pay for up to three further minority employees.
